title: Timesjobs Scraper
description: Extract job listings from Timesjobs.com with advanced filtering by keyword, location, and experience. Supports detailed scraping and pagination.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific Timesjobs search URL. If provided, this overrides keyword/location/experience filters.

keyword.title: Job Keyword
keyword.description: Search for jobs by keyword, such as 'Software Developer', 'Data Scientist', 'Marketing Manager'.

experience.title: Experience Range
experience.description: Filter by experience in years. Format: 'min-max' (e.g., '0-2', '3-5', '5-10').

collectDetails.title: Collect Full Job Details
collectDetails.description: Enable to visit each job's detail page for complete description and additional information.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Results
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of job listings to scrape. Set to a reasonable number to control scraping duration.

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages
max_pages.description: Maximum number of listing pages to visit. Useful as a safety limit for pagination.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Configure proxy settings. Recommended to use Apify Proxy for reliable scraping.
